ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1224
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea the box set gives you both the robo-pig and the shroud. However I m having a heck of a time finding the box set in my area. Unfortunately not due to the
ygData.messageBody:
Yea the box set gives you both the robo-pig and the shroud. However I'm having a heck of a time finding the box set in my area. Unfortunately not due to the popularity of Everquest but simply the big evil mart isn't carrying it.

Durgaa

On 4 Nov 2005 13:09:37 -0000, EverQuest@yahoogroups.com < EverQuest@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

Message: 1
   Date: Thu, 03 Nov 2005 17:37:28 -0600
   From: Su <suceress@...>
Subject: Re: Finally got rid of the old group...

The person who created the list quit EQ and left, but he handed it over to me a couple years ago. So I can't take credit for making it. And I have a moderator who handles most of the messages for me. :-) So I can't take much credit for that.
But I am glad that people are joining and hope that they enjoy it here.
To start a topic, has anyone received the new expansion yet? I heard if you buy the box set you get a free mechanical mount.
I also saw that the hotkey bar was changed to look more like the setup in World of Warcraft.
Anyone else noticed this?
luv,
-Su
